alert.note: Alert for Duval; Inland Kleberg; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Duval, southwestern Jim Wells and west central Kleberg Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 316 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over La Gloria, or near Premont, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Premont, Concepcion, Palito Blanco, La Gloria, Cruz Calle, Ramirez, Rios and Realitos. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 684 and 708. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
